price: ߕߟߏߜߋߘߋ߲߫ ߓߏߓߏ߫ ߝߎߦߋ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߬، ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߍߣߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߐߛߊ߬ߦߌ߬ ߟߴߏ߬ ߟߋ ߘߐ߫ ߘߍ߯
arabic: صُمُّۢ بُكۡمٌ عُمۡيٞ فَهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: ṣummun buk'mun ʿum'yun fahum lā yarjiʿūna
